<a id="TextureRect"></a>

# TextureRect

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A control that displays a texture.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A control that displays a texture, for example an icon inside a GUI. The texture's placement can be controlled with the [stretch_mode](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_property_stretch_mode) property. It can scale, tile, or stay centered inside its bounding rectangle.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [3D Voxel Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2755)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ExpandMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode)

<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_KEEP_SIZE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_KEEP_SIZE** = `0`

The minimum size will be equal to texture size, i.e. **TextureRect** can't be smaller than the texture.<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_IGNORE_SIZE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_IGNORE_SIZE** = `1`

The size of the texture won't be considered for minimum size calculation, so the **TextureRect** can be shrunk down past the texture size.<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH** = `2`

The height of the texture will be ignored. Minimum width will be equal to the current height. Useful for horizontal layouts, e.g. inside [HBoxContainer](HBoxContainer.md).<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH_PROPORTIONAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH_PROPORTIONAL** = `3`

Same as [EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH), but keeps texture's aspect ratio.<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT** = `4`

The width of the texture will be ignored. Minimum height will be equal to the current width. Useful for vertical layouts, e.g. inside [VBoxContainer](VBoxContainer.md).<a id="TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT_PROPORTIONAL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT_PROPORTIONAL** = `5`

Same as [EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT), but keeps texture's aspect ratio.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_TextureRect_StretchMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **StretchMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode)

<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_SCALE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_SCALE** = `0`

Scale to fit the node's bounding rectangle.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_TILE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_TILE** = `1`

Tile inside the node's bounding rectangle.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_KEEP"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_KEEP** = `2`

The texture keeps its original size and stays in the bounding rectangle's top-left corner.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_KEEP_CENTERED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_KEEP_CENTERED** = `3`

The texture keeps its original size and stays centered in the node's bounding rectangle.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT** = `4`

Scale the texture to fit the node's bounding rectangle, but maintain the texture's aspect ratio.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT_CENTERED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT_CENTERED** = `5`

Scale the texture to fit the node's bounding rectangle, center it and maintain its aspect ratio.<a id="TextureRect_constant_STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT_COVERED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **STRETCH_KEEP_ASPECT_COVERED** = `6`

Scale the texture so that the shorter side fits the bounding rectangle. The other side clips to the node's limits.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="TextureRect_property_expand_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **expand_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureRect_property_expand_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_expand_mode**\ (\ value\: [ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode)\ )
- [ExpandMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_ExpandMode) **get_expand_mode**\ (\ )

**Experimental:** Using [EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH), [EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH_PROPORTIONAL](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_WIDTH_PROPORTIONAL), [EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT), or [EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT_PROPORTIONAL](TextureRect.md#TextureRect_constant_EXPAND_FIT_HEIGHT_PROPORTIONAL) may result in unstable behavior in some [Container](Container.md) controls. This behavior may be re-evaluated and changed in the future.

Defines how minimum size is determined based on the texture's size.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureRect_property_flip_h"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **flip_h** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TextureRect_property_flip_h)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flip_h**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_flipped_h**\ (\ )

If ``true``, texture is flipped horizontally.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureRect_property_flip_v"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **flip_v** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#TextureRect_property_flip_v)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flip_v**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_flipped_v**\ (\ )

If ``true``, texture is flipped vertically.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextureRect_property_stretch_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **stretch_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextureRect_property_stretch_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stretch_mode**\ (\ value\: [StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode)\ )
- [StretchMode](TextureRect.md#enum_TextureRect_StretchMode) **get_stretch_mode**\ (\ )

Controls the texture's behavior when resizing the node's bounding rectangle.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )
